Key Match Events: Mpasi Nzau became a hero for DR Congo by converting a penalty with a clinical finish to send them to the quarterfinals
Post-Match Reflections: The Leopards are through to the quarterfinals and will face Guinea on February 2, 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: DR Congo will chase their first Afcon title in 50 years
Guinea advanced to the quarterfinals after beating Equatorial Guinea 1-0
Others: Egypt has been eliminated from the tournament at the round of 16 stage for the second time in three tournaments
